text:
I noticed a newly opened bak kut teh spot here and decided to give it a try. The taste was fantastic! The soup was flavorful without making me reach for water afterward. The dry bak kut teh came with a rich, delicious sauce, and the chicken feet were HUGE‚Äîsuch a generous portion for the price! Highly recommended, 5 stars ‚≠ê!

It tends to sell out by early evening, so come a bit earlier if you want to try it.

The service was excellent‚Äîpatient and very friendly üòÅ
Dry Bah Kut Teh is not bad... I requested for no organs (I don't like them). The meat texture is good. You can add garlic/chilli padi yourself.
Their meat is tender and soft. The soup is great! Too bad their braised meat is Out of stock that day. But get to tasted it in the soup. Will definitely be bad to try it.
Nice bak kut teh stall that served both the herbal and peppery type. They also serve the dried verion BKT.

I recently visited Hot BKT, and it was amazing! ü§©ü§©The Bak Kut Teh featured a rich, flavorful broth that was both comforting and delicious. The pork ribs were incredibly tender and complemented perfectly by the fresh herbs. The service was friendly and prompt, contributing to a great dining experience. I‚Äôm already looking forward to my next visit!
